moduleMetadataJson.name: DCOM Exec
moduleMetadataJson.description:
Performs various techniques to dump hashes from the remote machine
        without executing any agent there. For SAM and LSA Secrets (including
        cached creds) we try to read as much as we can from the registry and
        then we save the hives in the target system (%SYSTEMROOT%\Temp dir) and
        read the rest of the data from there.
author: Alberto Solino
Spencer McIntyre

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: THREADS
options.description: The number of concurrent threads (max one per host)

options.name: ShowProgress
options.description: Display progress messages during a scan

options.name: ShowProgressPercent
options.description: The interval in percent that progress should be shown

options.name: SMBDomain
options.description: The Windows domain to use for authentication

options.name: OutputFile
options.description: Write the results to a file

options.name: SMBPass
options.description: The password for the specified username

options.name: ExecMethod
options.description: The method to use for execution (Accepted: smbexec, wmiexec, mmcexec)
